properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:18AM PST until January 28 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...South Washington Cascades.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to noon Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level will rising to near 5000 feet by
evening, then drop back to 4000 to 4500 feet later tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON TUESDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 4500 FEET
